html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-10122022-09-23,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  CER, 
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Canadian Energy Regulator Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN CANADIAN ENERGY REGULATOR REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) change names, section numbers and terms that occur in the regulations to align with the Canada Energy Regulator (CER) Act and International and Interprovincial Power Line Damage Prevention Regulations – Obligations of Holders of Permits and Certificates; (2) remove a violation that referenced an amended section of the Canadian Energy Regulator Onshore Pipeline Regulations; (3) correct non-substantive inconsistencies between the English and French versions; (4) correct grammatical errors identified by the Standing Joint Committee on the Scrutiny of Regulations; and (5) amend an incorrect cross-reference identified by the CER.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0199 Publication Date: 2022-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Canadian Energy Regulator Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN CANADIAN ENERGY REGULATOR REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) change names, section numbers and terms that occur in the regulations to align with the Canada Energy Regulator (CER) Act and International and Interprovincial Power Line Damage Prevention Regulations – Obligations of Holders of Permits and Certificates; (2) remove a violation that referenced an amended section of the Canadian Energy Regulator Onshore Pipeline Regulations; (3) correct non-substantive inconsistencies between the English and French versions; (4) correct grammatical errors identified by the Standing Joint Committee on the Scrutiny of Regulations; and (5) amend an incorrect cross-reference identified by the CER.
